{docbook}
<highlights>
<itemizedlist>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.AuthoringPublicationPlugin">AuthoringPublicationPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Manage the publication lifecycle of web contents and DMS document on a portal page with more states and versions.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ContentTypeFilterPlugin">ContentTypeFilterPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Filter the WCM node types.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ContextPlugin">ContextPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Store the context configuration of a publication lifecycle. </para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ExcludeMimeTypes">ExcludeIncludeDataTypePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Filter the search results before these results are presented on the search page.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.FriendlyPlugin">FriendlyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Refine URLs in Content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ImageThumnailPlugin">ImageThumnailPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configure the file types and get thumbnail for images.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.IgnorePortalPlugin">IgnorePortalPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Avoid deploying data to the existing portals during a new portal creation.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.InitialWebcontentPlugin">InitialWebcontentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Deploy initial web-contents as the site artifact into the Site Artifact folder of a newly created portal.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.LinkDeploymentPlugin">LinkDeploymentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Create predefined Symlinks into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.LockGroupsOrUsersPlugin">LockGroupsOrUsersPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configure predefined groups or users for lock administration.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ManageDrivePlugin">ManageDrivePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Create a predefined drive into a repository.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ManageViewPlugin">ManageViewPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Create a predefined View into a repository.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.PDFThumnailPlugin">PDFThumnailPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Set the supported file types of PDF thumbnail.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.PortetTemplatePlugin">PortetTemplatePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Import the view templates into Content List Viewer.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.QueryPlugin">QueryPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Store predefined queries into the repositories of the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.RemoveTaxonomyPlugin">RemoveTaxonomyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Invalidate taxonomy trees in categories folder of a portal when the portal is removed.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ScriptActionPlugin">ScriptActionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Import the predefined script actions into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ScriptPlugin">ScriptPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Add groovy scripts into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.StageAndVersionPublicationPlugin">StageAndVersionPublicationPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Control the state life cycle of a content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.StatesLifecyclePlugin">StatesLifecyclePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Control the state life cycle of a content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TagPermissionPlugin">TagPermissionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configure the predefined permission for tags to inject in JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TagStylePlugin">TagStylePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configure the predefined styles for tags to inject in JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TaxonomyPlugin">TaxonomyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configure the predefined taxonomies to inject into JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TemplatePlugin">TemplatePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Create templates into the system. A template is a presentation to display the saved information.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.XMLdeploymentPlugin">XMLdeploymentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Deploy some "default" contents, such as Banner, Footer, Navigation, and Breadcrumb of a website.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.BaseAction_CreatePortal_Publication_RemovePortal">BaseActionPlugin/CreatePortalPlugin/PublicationPlugin/RemovePortalPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> 
		</para>
          <para>Create a link from the plugin to its children.</para>
  </listitem>
</itemizedlist>
</highlights>
{docbook}

This section describes the main component plugins used in Content.
Each part supplies an example configuration with the explanation about ini-params so you can know how to use these plugins.
